name: SUPER ASSFUCK RPG
description:
From the people who brought you..nothing! 

"SUPER ASSFUCK RPG" follows the story of our protagonist Shitstain, who wants to get some chips but will need to use the power of friendship to reach his goal! Follow him in his quest to reach the chips with the help of his friends and try to stop the evil PISSTAIN from ruining his plans!

Made for the #riggyjam3 with a lot of love and help from my friends:

- carmoule

- png103 

- goldendiossito

- ghoulishmaskguy

- klutz

- skywrooth

- kuro

SPECIAL THANKS to swagathor :)
